title: Update a Live Blog
description: During a developing news event (like an election night), an editor must continuously update a live blog with the latest information from reporters.

tasks.description: Monitor internal communication channels (e.g., Slack) for updates from field reporters.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is aware of all incoming information.

tasks.description: Quickly write a short, clear update for each new piece of information.
tasks.expected_outcome: New information is turned into a blog post format.

tasks.description: Publish the update to the live blog, ensuring the newest posts appear at the top.
tasks.expected_outcome: The live blog is kept current with the latest developments.
